entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the person being spoken to by Mrs Weasley. ("Good Lord, is it Harry Potter? Very pleased to meet you...")

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as having told others about Harry Potter. ("Ron’s told us so much about –")

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as being angry and scolding her sons for flying a car to Harry's house. ("Your sons flew that car to Harry’s house and back last night! What have you got to say about that, eh?")

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is mentioned as being eager to hear about the flying of the car. ("Did it go all right? I-I mean,")

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is mentioned as being shy and not speaking normally. ("You don’t know how weird it is for her to be this shy, she never shuts up normally –")

entities.name: the burrow 35
entities.description: The Burrow 35 is mentioned as the location where Harry and Ron are visiting. ("T HE BURROW 35")

relationships.description: Mr Weasley spoke to Harry Potter. ("Good Lord, is it Harry Potter? Very pleased to meet you...")
Mrs Weasley scolded Mr Weasley for his sons flying a car. ("Your sons flew that car to Harry’s house and back last night! What have you got to say about that, eh?")
Ron Weasley showed Harry around the Burrow. ("Come on, I’ll show you my bedroom.")
Ginny Weasley was seen by Ron when he opened her door. ("Harry just caught sight of a pair of bright brown eyes staring at him before it closed with a snap.")
